text: It is sunset. We drift through the clouds, approaching NU FOUR, PRIVET DRIVE. We sail over the roof of NUMBER FOUR continue on past it into the street. We drift down into an abandoned playground. A lone figure sits on the only unbroken swing.. It is HARRY POTTER. He appears deep in thought. Had he been watching more carefully, he would have seen t old MRS. FIGG watching him from her front porch. MRS. FIGG adjusts her porch chair in order to watch Harry better. The sound of harsh laughter reaches Harry's ears. He look up. Dudley and his gang of followers are walking down the street, telling crude jokes and laughing. They ignore Harry and continue on out of sight. Harry get his feet and follows them.
Harry rounds the corner, only to find himself surrounded Dudley's gang.
Oh, it's you.
What should we do with him, Big D? Harry laughs.
Big D? Cool name, but to me, you'll always be Ikkle Duddicums.
Shut up! One of Dudley's gang steps in as if to punch Harry. Harry glares at him. The gang member pauses, then steps back again.
Ooo, tough guy. Not so tough in your bed, are you?
What? MRS. FIGG stands up and goes to the edge of her porch.
You boys go home now, or I'll be calling your parents! They pause and edge away from Harry.
I heard you talking in your sleep, last night. Crying. "No, don't kill Cedric, don't kill Cedric! Dad, help me, heeelp me! He's going to kill me! Boo-hoo!" Dudley's gang laughs.
Shut up, Dudley. I'm warning you...
Why should I? Harry whips out his wand and points it at Dudley.
Because if you don't I'll turn you into the idiot pig you are! Dudley's gang laughs at Harry. Dudley, on the other hand, terrified.
(terrified) Don't point that thing at me!
Not so brave now, are you Duddykins? Now tell your little friends to go away. Dudley quivers, then finally complies.
G-go home!
What?
Get out of here! Suddenly nervous, they turn and edge away, soon vanishing into the night. Harry tightened his grip on his wand, glaring fourteen ye of hatred and rage at Dudley.
(cont. ) Don't you ever speak about that again. You understand?
Don't point that thing at me!

Suddenly, a cold wind blows through the street, causing everyone to shiver. Harry exhales and his breath is tinge with frost. The street lights flicker, die, and frost over. Dudley is turning in a circle, terrified.
What's happening?

Quiet! The stars go out, plunging them into darkness. Dudley yells in fear. Harry turns to the end of the street. Gliding as smooth a death over the street, tattered robes drifting in the win comes a DEMENTOR.
Dudley! Run! He turns, grabs his cousin by the arm and drags him down alleyway. Beyond the mouth of the alleyway is the next street, and Number Four, Privet Drive.

Come on! They break into a run. A dementor drifts into the alleyw front of them. Skidding to a stop, Harry turns around, to find the other dementor cutting off the way back. Harry spots a fire escape ladder, leading onto the roof o the house. He taps Dudley on the back, and starts to point to it, wh Dudley turns and punches Harry in the jaw. Dazed, Harry stumbles backwards and falls to his back. His glasses sli from his face. His wand clatters away from him. Crying, Dudley runs away from Harry, towards the first dementor.
Dudley, no! Harry feels the ground for his glasses but cannot find th His hands scrabble on the ground in desperation.
Lumos ! Three feet away from him, his wand lights up. Harry snatc it up and turns. The dementor closes the distance to Harry swiftly, and is suddenly right before him. Harry raises his wand.
'Expecto Patronum!' A wisp of misty light protrudes from the tip of his wand, not enough. Harry stiffens and gasps. The dementor closes in for the kill.
Bow to death, Harry...

Haaaaaaaarry!... Harry falls onto his back, and the dementor closes the distance. Dudley SCREAMS in the black. Harry glances at him.  Dudley is on his back, hands pulled apart by the other dementor, and the great cloaked head lowering to deliver kiss. Harry raises his wand in desperation.

‘EXPECTO PATRONUM!' There is a blinding explosion of light as Harry's PATRONO bursts forth, blasting the dementor backwards and away. The light INTENSIFIES, PULSATING from Harry’s wand, expan to fill the alley with wave after pulsing wave of PURE LI The dementors flee. The stars, and street lamps flicker to life again. Dudley lays on the ground, whimpering and shaking. FOOTSTEPS from behind Harry. He turns, wand at the ready, see UNCLE VERNON and AUNT PETUNIA running up to him. He starts to lower it. But they are staring dumbfounded into the sky, watching t Dementors soar away.
What the hell are those?
Dementors. Petunia kneels on the ground next to Dudley.
What happened, Duddikins? Vernon turns on Harry, who hastily lowers his wand.
What the hell is a dementoid? Petunia seizes Dudley and attempts to look into his mouth
They didn't--?
No. Vernon shoves a large finger at Harry.
I want some answers!
We were attacked.
By those...things?
They’re evil. If they get the chance, they'll suck your soul out through your mouth.
They guard the wizard prison, Azkaban. Vernon and Harry look dumbfounded.
How do you know that? Petunia shakes her head, looking panicky. Vernon helps Dudley unsteadily to his feet, patting him o the shoulder.
Fought 'em off, eh, Dud? Gave ‘em the ol' one-two?
You can't give a Dementor the 'ol one-two.'
Why is he all right then?

Because I used magic to save his life! The street-lights die, plunging the street into darkness. Several cloaked people appear around them on the street. Dursleys yell in surprise. They move closer. Harry stands, brandishing his wand.
Lumos !  Ten wizards stand around them, wands out. Mad-eye Moody, Remus Lupin, Nymphadora Tonks, Kingsley Shacklebolt, Elph Doge, Dedalus Diggle, Emmeline Vance, Sturgis Podmore, an Hestia Jones.
Who are all you lot?
Quiet, Dursley.
Harry, douse the light. We're exposed here.
(nodding) Nox. Darkness returns to the street, which is now lit only by light of the moon.
What are you doing here?
We're your advanced guard, Harry. Dumbledore just sent us as soon as he heard about the attack. We're taking you to safety. We're just waiting for the all clear.
How’d he know? It just happened!
You didn’t think Dumbledore’d let you wander around on your own, did you? Lupin indicates Tonks.
Harry, I don’t believe you've met Nymphadora Tonks. She smiles at him.
Tonks, would you go get Harry's broom from the house? She nods and departs.  Harry looks at Lupin.
What's been going on? What's Lord Vol- Three of the advanced guard jump.
We're not talking about it here, it's too risky. Moody's eye stuck backwards in his head.
Blast it. He pulls his eye from it's socket with a horrible sucking sound.
Mad-eye, dear, you do realize that's disgusting?
I want 365 degree visibility on the return trip.
How are we getting there?
Brooms. Red sparks fly into the air in the distance. Tonks returns with the broom, handing it to Harry.
There's the first signal.
Right, let's go.
On your broom, Harry. Moody is moving around them.
Form up! Form up around Harry. Make it snappy!  The advanced guard surrounds Harry.

We'll be flying in close-quarters formation. Tonks will be right in front of you, keep close to her at all times. (pause) Don't stop, and whatever you do, don't break formation. If any of us are killed, the rest of you, keep flying. (pause) If that were to happen, the survivors, fly to the east. The rear guard is standing by. They will find you.
Stop being so cheerful, Mad-eye.
We must be ready. This would be the perfect moment for Voldemort to strike Harry.
Uh, is that very likely?
No one's going to die. Blue sparks blast into the sky.
There's the second signal!
Mount your brooms, everyone. Here we go! Seconds later, there is an explosion of green sparks in t sky.
The third signal, everyone. Let's go! They kick off from the ground, which is swiftly left behi
Stay in formation!  10. They are not as high as the clouds yet.
We need more height! It is only seconds later, that another warning is shouted their way. A dementor soars towards them, tattered robes snapping in wind.
Contacts to the south!
Mad-eye! You, Tonks, and Lupin take Harry! We'll slow them down! The rest of the advanced guard peels away from the group. Harry checks the sky around them. It appears to be clear.
There's the other one, Alastor! The other Dementor emerges very close by from a cloud.
Expecto--!
Harry, leave it to us! And Lupin peels away, rocketing towards the Dementor.
No! Lupin goes straight at the Dementor, which smoothly flips upwards, bypassing Lupin, but Lupin twists his broom arou his wand drawn, and points it at the Dementor's retreatin back.

'Expecto Patronum!' Lupin's PATRONOUS explodes from his wand tip, pulsing out through the clouds at the Dementor. The light blasts into and the Dementor, shrieking eerily, retreats back towards rest of the advanced guard. Lupin rockets past Harry, Tonks, and Moody.  11.
Get Harry to the safe house!
Come on, Potter! Keep moving!
But I can help!
Potter, getting yourself killed won't do a thing. Now move! Glaring at Moody, Harry wheels his broom around and the t of them set off again, leaving the battle behind.
We're not far, now! Soon after, Lupin and the rest of the advanced guard retu intact and without injury.
Did you get rid of them?
They're gone, Alastor.
We're there!

Prepare for descent! Form up around Harry! They cut through the clouds, gliding lower as they went. Tonks touches down right before Harry did, the rest glidi down while maintaining their formation around Harry. All business, they draw their wands.
Stay here, Harry. Several of the advanced guard move to the perimeter, to secure it.
Clear!
Right, Harry, this way.  12. Harry follows him, Tonks and Lupin trailing after, wands the ready, eyes flicking to the buildings surrounding the

Here, read this. He hands Harry a piece of paper. It has written on it: "T Headquarters of the Order of the Phoenix may be found at Number Twelve, Grimmauld Place, London." Harry looks at the gap between the houses, and suddenly a door appears, followed by the rest of a large, gray, rath imposing house. Moody takes the paper from Harry and set it afire with hi wand.

Come on, inside. Hurry. LUPIN and TONKS step up, close to Harry, one on either si The guards at the perimeter close in a semi-circle around door. LUPIN taps the door with his wand, and it cracks open.
Get in, quick, Harry. Don't touch anything.

Harry enters the musty entry hall. To one side is a stair leading up to the next level. At the base of the stair is dirty, graying sheet hanging on the wall, as if it were covering something. Behind him, the other members of the advanced guard are entering. To make room, Harry steps to one side, and runs into an umbrella stand, which clangs loudly as it hits th ground. To steady himself, he reaches out and pulls the sheet fro the wall. Behind it is a portrait of an unpleasant, old, thin, woman.

Filth! Scum! Half-breeds, mutants, freaks, begone from this place! How dare you befoul the house of my fathers?!  13. SIRIUS BLACK comes running into the entry hall. He skids halt next to Harry, looking up at MRS BLACK.
Shut up, you miserable old hag! Quiet!
Blood traitor, abomination, shame of my flesh!

Yes, yes, do shut up! He throws the sheet over the picture, and the yells die a Panting, SIRIUS looks at Harry and grins. He wraps Harry huge bear hug. Harry laughs. Pulling away, Sirius smiles at Harry.
Was that your--?
Mother, yes. Dear old mum.
But...why here?

This house has been my family's for centuries. It's mine now. (pause) I'm the last of the Blacks. I offered it up as headquarters for, well, and Dumbledore accepted. It's about the most useful thing I've been able to do for a long while. MRS WEASLEY enters the hall.
Hello, Harry dear.
Mrs. Weasley!
Sirius, the meeting is about to start!  14.
Right.
Harry, dear, go on upstairs- quietly, if you please. They're all up there. Harry looks up the stairs.
Harry! Harry looks up the stairs and sees RON and HERMIONE stand on the landing. He mounts the stairs to both of them, grinning. Hermione throws herself on Harry in a large hug, laughing
Let him breathe, Hermione!
Oh, Harry! We've missed you! Are you furious with us, I bet you are!
Hermione lets Harry go and takes a deep breath.
Good to see you, mate.
Come on, inside. They enter an adjacent bedroom.
They sit down on separate beds.
Sorry we haven't written, Harry, but Dumbledore made us promise not to.
We wanted to, mate, we really did, but he thought they would get intercepted.  15. There is an awkward silence.
Right.
He thought you would be safest there.
Yeah, real safe. Attacked by Dementors, that's safe, that is.
He was so angry when he heard. It was...scary...
So, why's he keeping me in the dark? Hermione and Ron look awkward.
Didn't you bother asking?
We've only seen him twice, and not for very long. He's really busy.
So I get to spend the summer with the Dursleys while you two are here.
It's not that fun, mate. Mum won't let us anywhere near the meetings.
You've still been here! Hermione and Ron are looking aghast at Harry. Harry looks away. There is a silence.
What's been going on?
We've already told you, we're not privyed to the meetings. But we do know a few things.  16.
Some of the Order are following known Death Eaters, like Lucious Malfoy. (pause) And they're guarding something.
What’s this Order everyone's talking about?
The Order of the Phoenix. Dumbledore started it last time to fight You-Know-Who. He only reorganized it after last term. Moments later, MRS. WEASLEY opens the door to their room.
You can come down now, the meeting's over. They stand up to go.

Harry, Ginny, Hermione, Ron, and Mrs. Weasley enter the KITCHEN, which has been set up with long tables and chair At the far end of the long table, MR. WEASLEY and CHARLIE WEASLEY are talking quietly over a parchment.
Arthur- MR. WEASLEY looks up, sees them, and nods to Charlie, who rolls up the parchment hastily, and rises from his seat, moving across the room. Harry sits down at the table, across from Sirius.
Well, the Ministry is furious with you.
Why?
You did magic in front of your muggle cousin. (MORE )
SIRIUS (cont'd) You'll have to go to an disciplinary meeting tomorrow.
Okay. Harry stands up.
I'm not really hungry. I think I'll go to bed.
You surprise me, Harry. I figured the first thing you'd do is start asking about Voldemort. Harry pauses, then turns around. The room has gone very still. Mrs. Weasley is glaring at Sirius.
I wanted to, but I didn't think you'd tell me anything.
And that was quite right, Harry! You're much to young--
He has a right to know, Molly.
It's not your decision!
I know what Dumbledore said, but he needs to know something.
(grinning) Yeah.
He's not a child, Molly.
He's not an adult either! (pause) He's not James. 17.  18.
(stiffly) I'm fully aware of who he is, Molly.
I only have Harry's best interests at heart.
He's not your son.
Who else does he have, then? Sirius stands, glaring at Mrs. Weasley.
He's got me. He's like a son to me. Harry stares at Sirius in surprise. Mrs. Weasley turns an storms out. Sirius sits, heavily.
What do you want to know, Harry?
Where's Voldemort? What's he doing?
He's hiding for the moment, because the Ministry is ignoring his return and he doesn't want that to change.
(smiling) You really messed things up for him last year, Harry.
How?
The last person You-Know-Who wanted to alert was Dumbledore.
And what's his plan?  19.
He's building up his army again, just like before.
And you're stopping him from gaining followers?
We're doing our best, but it's proving to be...difficult.
You see, when the Ministry of Magic insists that Voldemort isn't back.
But...why?
Fudge likes being Minister of Magic. If it turns out that Voldemort came back under his watch, he'll be sacked.
But you're telling people, right? Sirius laughed.
Well, they think I'm a mass- murderer, Lupin is a werewolf, Tonks and Arthur would lose their jobs at the Ministry...
But Dumbledore is doing all he can.
If he keeps it up, he might end up in Azkaban. And that would give You- Know-Who a clear field to-- MR WEASLEY stops short and looks as if he'd nearly said t much.
What?  20.
You-Know-Who wants something. Something he didn't have last time. A weapon.
What kind of weapon? Lupin and Sirius exchange looks.
I'm sorry, Harry, we can't say anything more.
Harry sleeps. He dreams.

Harry moves slowly down a dark hallway. It has many, bolt doors down its long sides. Soon he is running. Then, suddenly, he is being pulled al the doors rushing past faster and faster. Harry can see t end of the hallway, it is a blinding light, still only a speck. It grows larger as he rockets towards it, then he flies r into it and the light explodes all around him, engulfing
Harry wakes with a CRY, sitting straight up in bed. He's covered in sweat, looking disturbed.
MRS. WEASLEY, MR WEASLEY, LUPIN, RON, HERMIONE, and GINNY standing in the hall, waiting, as Sirius and Harry descen the stairs.
Morning, dear! Did you have a good sleep?
No, my scar kept hurting. MR. WEASLEY and LUPIN exchange nervous glances.  21.
(bracingly) Probably just nerves...
Yeah...nerves...
Good luck, Harry! She hugs Harry. After the hug, Harry stands back, but is suddenly hugged Hermione.
They'll have to let you off, Harry... You were defending yourself! I checked the laws.
Thanks, Hermione.
What does he get a hug for?
(cooly) When you have to go to a disciplinary hearing at the Ministry of Magic, I'll hug you too.
Oh, sure, that's why.
(laughing) Ronald Weasley, are you jealous?
(glancing at the smirking Ginny and Mrs. Weasley) Me? Jealous? Of course not, it just doesn't seem fair that you hug one friend more than the other, is all...
Would you like a hug?  22.
(miffed) No, I'd hate to force you... Harry grins and shakes his head.
Well, come on, Harry. Time to go.
Bye. He waves, and he and MR WEASLEY depart.
The street is not very crowded, as the sun rises in the e Harry and Mr. Weasley hurry along the sidewalk and come t PHONEBOOTH. Mr. Weasley looks around cautiously.
Good, good, not very many Muggles. He opens the PHONEBOOTH and slips inside. He beckons to Harry.

Well, come on Harry, in we go. Harry slips inside the booth, and Mr. Weasley, with some difficulty, closes the door behind them. Mr. Weasley picks up the phone and listens in the wrong e for a moment.

I do love using the Fellytone! Now, let's see, what's the number again... He punches in SIX, TWO, FOUR, FOUR, TWO. There is a tap on the glass of the box. Mr. Weasley glanc out of the window to see a MUGGLE MAN standing outside. T MAN taps his watch impatiently. Mr. Weasley holds up a finger, as to say, "just a second. The MAN sighs and turns around, tapping his foot.  23.
Welcome to the Ministry of Magic. Please state your business.
Harry Potter, disciplinary hearing.
Pleas stand by. There is a pause, and then the whole phone booth begins t sink down into the ground. The MAN, his back to the booth, is completely oblivious.
The booth sinks lower into the ground.

Usually I Apparate, but you're too young, so I thought we'd take the scenic route. The booth SHUDDERS to a halt, and the door slides open, revealing a large lobby, filled with busy-looking wizards witches going to and fro. Harry and Mr. Weasley exit the phone booth and enter the lobby. The door to the PHONE BOOTH closes, and it slides up agai out of sight.
THe MUGGLE MAN stands tapping his foot. The booth reemerges topside and stops, looking very innoc The man turns around, blinks, and glances around for the people that had been inside it before.
Mr. Weasley walks through the crowd of wizards.
Keep close, Harry! A stooped, timid-looking, white-haired wizard pushes his through the crowd towards Mr. Weasley.  24.
Ah, Perkins, good morn-
Arthur, they've changed the time of Potter's hearing.
Blast! Dumbledore thought they might try that.
It started at eight!

Good lord, that was five minutes ago! Come on, Harry! They break into a run. They jog down hallway after hallwa then Mr Weasley leads Harry onto a large lift. There are several other witches and wizards on it. It descends shudderingly for a few moments, then stops.
Department of Mysteries.
Department of Mysteries?

Yep, I've got no idea what they get up to in here, it's top secret. The lift doors open. Harry and Mr. Weasley exit, running corridors. Harry skids to a stop and looks down a dark hallway. Mr. Weasley stops as well, and glances back at Harry.
Come on, Harry!
I've been there before... Mr. WEASLEY looks nervous, then grabs Harry's robes and d him along.
Now, Harry, I find that highly unlikely...  25. A few moments later, they arrive.
There you are, Harry, in you go...good luck... Harry enters the chamber.

One side of the courtroom is an elevated zigarat-shaped series of seats carved from black stone. The whole room is dark, save a light shining through from ceiling down on the center of the room, where a single wo chair sits, covered in chains.
You're late.
Er...sorry.
No matter, the accused will take his seat. Harry does so, glancing nervously at the chains on it.
Very well, we are ready to begin.
Witness for the Defence, Albus Percival Wulfric Brian Dumbledore. Harry turns in his seat. Dumbledore stands by the door of the COURTROOM, looking u the Minister.
Ah...you...er...got our message that the time had changed, did you?

(cheerfully) Must have missed it. (pause) However, due to a fortunate mistake, I arrived at the Ministry three hours early.  26. DUMBLEDORE conjures up a SQUASHY, CHINTZ armchair next to Harry's and sits down with a mild squeak. He steeples his fingers and looks up at the Minister with expression of polite interest.
Well. The...ah...charges. He consults his notes.

The charges against the accused shall now be read into the record: That the accused did with deliberation and fore-knowledge of the illegality of his actions, produce a patronus charm in full sight of a Muggle. (pause) (To Harry) You are Harry James Potter?
Yes.
And you conjured a patronus on the night of the eleventh of August?
Yes, but-
Within full sight of a Muggle?
Yes, but-
You produced a Patronus? A fully- formed Patronus, with a clearly- defined shape?
Yes.
That is most remarkable, Mr. Potter.  27.
It doesn't matter how impressive it was!
But I did it because of the Dementors!
What do you mean?
My cousin and I were attacked by Dementors. That's why I had to use the Patronus, to drive them away.
Ah, yes, yes, another cock-and-bull story.
It's the truth!
(sarcastically) Of course it is.
Dementors in Little Whinging?
Oh, come now, Susan. He's clearly lying.
Actually, we have a witness to the presence of the Dementors in question.
We haven't got time to-

I may be wrong, but I do believe that it says somewhere in the Wizagammot Charter of Rights that the Accused has the right to present witnesses to prove his or her case? In fact, I do believe I wrote that particular bit myself.  28.
Very well. Weasley, fetch the witness. Percy goes to the door and lets MRS. FIGG in. She stands in front of Harry and Dumbledore nervously.
Full name?
Arabella Doreen Figg, resident of Little Whinging.
So...what is your story?
I was sitting on my porch when I saw the two Dementors gliding towards the two boys.
What did the Dementors look like?
Well, they were big and wore great, tattered cloaks. There is some murmuring among the Wizengamot at that.
Anything else?
I-I felt them. It was horrible...like I would never be happy again.
Very well, you may go. MRS FIGG hurrys from the COURTROOM.
Not very convincing.
Oh, I disagree. She described their effects very completely.  29.
So two Dementors just happen to be in Little Whinging? I think not...
Only if the Dementors are still taking their orders from only the Ministry these days. I believe you know my views on this, Cornelius.
Yes, and they're nothing but bilge, Dumbledore. UMBRIDGE shifts into the light. She is a short, ugly, toa like woman.
Excuse me, Dumbledore, but did you just accused the Ministry of Magic of ordering an attack on this boy?

If the Dementors are taking their orders from the Ministry exclusively, then it must certainly follow logically that someone in the Ministry ordered the attack. (pause) And in that case, I'm sure the Ministry will make a full inquiry.
Dementors are irrelevant!

On the contrary, Cornelius. If they were there, then Harry was acting in self-defense, which is perfectly allowable under Clause Seven of the Decree of Reasonable Restriction of Underaged Wizardry. (pause) We are all in agreement on this?
Well, yes, if he's telling the truth!
You have heard it from eye- witnesses, Cornelius.  30.
Very well, all for clearing the accused of charges? He glances around the room, noting all the hands in the a
All opposed? Only a few hands.
(angrily) Fine! Cleared of all charges!

Excellent. Dumbledore gets out of his chair, vanishes it with the wa of a wand, and sweeps from the COURTROOM. Harry gets out of the wooden chair, glances upward at Umbridge. Their eyes meet for a split second. She glowers at him. Harry exits.
Harry exits the COURTROOM to find Mr. Weasley standing outside, beaming.
Harry, you've been let off! That's wonderful! The door opens again and the whole of the Wizengamot exit
You were tried by the full court?
I think so, yeah.
(concerned) Well, no matter. Let's go home. Just then, Percy exits and brushes by Mr. Weasley without even looking at him.  31.
Er...is Percy mad at you?

Ah...yes...I'm afraid we had a bit of a row. He, well, he sided with Fudge and the rest of us sided with Dumbledore, so Percy left. They begin walking away from the courtroom, when they com upon Fudge talking quietly with LUCIUS MALFOY, standing a the mouth of the corridor Harry had recognized earlier.
Well, well, if it isn't Patronus Potter. (pause) The Minister here was just telling me how very lucky an escape you just had. Quite astonishing...snakelike, in fact.
What are you doing here?
Come now, Potter, I really don't think that private matters between the Minister and myself are any concern of yours. Lucius moves closer to Harry.
(lowly) All you need to concern yourself about are...your dreams, Potter. And Lucius smiles malevolently at Harry. Lucius steps back and turns to the Minister.
Shall we continue this in your office, Fudge?
Certainly. Harry watches them go.  32.
If he wanted to talk to the Minister, why down here?
Dunno, Harry. Some things are just beyond comprehension. As he speaks, Mr Weasley glances down the long, dark hall with a worried look.
Harry stands in the kitchen of GRIMMAULD PLACE, surrounde Ron, Ginny, Fred, George, Hermione, Sirius, Lupin, Mr and Weasley, and Tonks.
(shouting) I knew it! In the background, Ginny, Fred, and George are dancing a strange JIG.
(singing) He got off, he got off, he got off! Hermione hugs Harry again. Ron glowers at her.
Settle down, you three! The chanting and dancing dies away. Mrs Weasley exits the Kitchen.
Sirius, we saw Fudge talking with Lucius Malfoy on Level Nine again. Tell Dumbledore, next time he comes in, would you?
Yeah, absolutely.
Well, I'd better be off. I've got a bewitched vomiting toilet to deal with.
George, remember that concept. Vomiting Toilet.  33.
Right you are, Fred.
Also, I'm covering for Tonks on guard duty later tonight, so I won't be back until late. Harry's scar explodes in pain. He yelps, and claps his ha to his forehead.
Harry! Harry gasps with pain and falls to his knees. Then, as suddenly as it had come, the pain vanishes. Shaken, Harry gasps as Sirius helps him over to a chair.
You all right, Harry?
Yeah...just...my scar...the pain is getting stronger. Sirius gives a worried glance to Lupin, who looks grim.
Harry sits on his bunk, thinking. Sirius enters the room, Harry barely reacts, still gazing into space.
Harry, I've got something that might interest you. Harry looks up. Sirius sits on the edge of the bed and brandishes an old, tattered photo. Harry takes it.
This was the original Order of the Phoenix. Found it while we were cleaning. Harry looks down at all the smiling faces.
There's Mad-eye and Dumbledore, right next to Dedalus Diggle; Marlene McKinnon, she was killed two weeks after this was taken...; (MORE)

SIRIUS (cont'd) then there's Frank and Alice Longbottom, tortured into insanity by Death Eaters; Lupin, of course.. (pause) Ah, Edgar Bones, they only ever found bits of him; Caradoc Dearborn, he vanished six months later...; Hagrid, of course; Gideon and Fabian Prewett, it took five Death Eaters to finish those two off; me, of course...; and there they are! Harry watches his parents beam up at him.
My parents. He watches the picture for a long second.
